location.mountain: Mt. Emei (Emeishan / 峨嵋山) - Known for its steep cliffs and sea of clouds.

heritage.founder: Guo Xiang (곽양) in some lore, or a Buddhist Nun master.
heritage.philosophy: Buddhist (Female Monks / Bhikkhuni). Strong moral code but can be dogmatic.
heritage.trait: Predominantly female. Men can join as lay disciples but rarely hold high power.

status.tier: Major Sect (One of the Nine Great Sects).
status.political_role: A strong voice in the Alliance. Often conflicts with Wudang or Shaolin over philosophy.

combat_style.summary: Fast, Sharp, and Ruthless against evil.

signature_ultimate.name: 멸절검법 (Extinction Sword / 滅絕劒法)
signature_ultimate.description: Cruel and overwhelming sword art designed to eradicate evil completely.

role: The strict, conservative faction that opposes the protagonist's unconventional methods.
